name: ListItem.Part
description: A sub ListItem component for layout-ing inside a ListItem

props.name: left
props.description: this part content will be aligned to left

props.name: middle
props.description: this part content will be aligned to spreaded

props.name: right
props.description: this part content will be aligned to right

props.name: row
props.description: this part content direction will be row

props.name: column
props.description: this part content direction will be column
